Gayle and I are terribly saddened to hear the news of the passing of Evelyn Roberts, mother of UMWA president Cecil Roberts. During this incredibly difficult time, our thoughts and prayers are with Cecil, their families, and all of the members of UMWA family that knew her well.

I'm glad that @CommerceGov's Economic Development Administration has awarded $1.5 million to improve water infrastructure in White Sulphur Springs. This investment marks an important milestone in our recovery from the 2016 flooding. MORE: https://sen.gov/Q0WK

Our coal miners shouldn’t pay the price when coal companies go bankrupt. But once again, retired coal miners are having their healthcare & pensions ripped away from them after years of backbreaking work. It’s past time Congress kept our promise & passed the American Miners Act

We can't keep solely relying on carrier-reported data for our broadband maps. That's why I'm urging @AjitPaiFCC to implement a public feedback mechanism so consumers & states can inform broadband coverage maps & report areas w/o broadband to the FCC. MORE: https://sen.gov/LLRK
Although it took us a long time to get here, I’m glad we’ve finally passed these bills, avoided another government shutdown, and brought many positive changes to #WV and our nation.

Finally, "Skylar's Law" is included in the bill. This bill will direct the Secretary to establish a National Endangered Missing Advisory network that would enable immediate public notification regardless of evidence of abduction. pic.twitter.com/VEgxIxacBB
@Amtrak's Charleston ticket agent is restored under the funding bill. It also requires Amtrak to justify decisions that jeopardize the future of the annual New River Train. pic.twitter.com/b7DW7cfLBa

The bill provides significant funding to the USDA for their rural broadband loan and grant programs, and helps to support NTIA’s effort to improve national broadband coverage maps. It also directs NTIA to engage with rural communities to enhance accuracy. pic.twitter.com/zP92QTYHvu

Securing our nation's borders protects the state of West Virginia and the country as a whole. The funding bill includes $1.7B for border security technology, $1.375B in funding for construction of the wall, and $44M for new personnel at ICE to investigate opioid trafficking. pic.twitter.com/luW3QobIkV

The bill includes nearly $1B for federal agencies specifically directed at fighting the opioid epidemic. It ensures aid is prioritized to rural areas with the highest rates of addiction like West Virginia. pic.twitter.com/iMSsNxvlpP
I’m glad Republicans and Democrats have come together on these seven appropriations bills, which include many of my #WV priorities.

Being a Boy Scout was one of the highlights of my life. Happy 109th birthday, @boyscouts - we can't wait to host Scouts from around the world right here in WV at @BechtelSummit during the @2019_wsj later this year!

These bills will give people more chances to get help & ensure we’re fighting this crisis while stopping new people from becoming addicted to these horrible drugs. I hope that my colleagues will help those battling addiction & sign these bills into law. https://sen.gov/WQX3

The DEA Enforcement and Authority Act would restore the DEA’s ability to effectively enforce our nation’s drug laws by making the critical changes requested by the Department of Justice to the Ensuring Patient Access and Effective Drug Enforcement Act, which passed in 2016. pic.twitter.com/h2aIvlP9Cu

The Protecting Americans from Dangerous Opioids Act would put a cap on the number of FDA approved opioid medications, by requiring the FDA to remove approval for an existing opioid medication for every new opioid medication that it approves. pic.twitter.com/K5L5hz7inn

The FDA Accountability for Public Safety Act requires FDA to seek advice of an advisory cmte before approving new opioids & requires FDA to provide report to Congress if it goes against the advice of that cmte. Distribution of drug would be prohibited until report is submitted. pic.twitter.com/EDKEB1xoCK

The Changing the Culture of the FDA Act changes the FDA's mission statement to include its responsibility for addressing the public health impact of the opioid epidemic. To date, FDA has failed to consider the devastating impact of the dangerously addictive opioids it approves. pic.twitter.com/hv84Tcc6zo

The LifeBOAT Act will establish a 1¢ fee on each mG of opioid in a pain pill to fund efforts to provide & expand access to substance abuse treatment. It includes a rebate for cancer related pain and hospice patients & an exemption for opioids used for medically assisted treatment pic.twitter.com/r0UGZnK7n1

People suffering with addiction are not bad people and deserve a second chance. The Clean Start Act will give an opportunity for people to have their criminal record sealed after undergoing comprehensive addiction treatment & demonstrating a commitment to their recovery. pic.twitter.com/Zh3EiJCmFS

WV is ground zero of the opioid epidemic and I have been working to make sure that we have the right tools to fight this crisis. That's why I've reintroduced 6 bills that address various aspects of the crisis. MORE:  https://sen.gov/WQX3

This #publiclands package makes sense for #WV & it makes sense for the country. Permanently reauthorizing the #LWCF will help preserve West Virginia’s #AlmostHeaven natural beauty for generations to come and is a boom to our state’s economy. pic.twitter.com/YmVxczWcPt

I met with representatives from the Community Anti-Drug Coalition in WV to talk about the importance of keeping our communities safe and drug-free. I'll continue to push for legislation to help those suffering with addiction while keeping more WVians from becoming addicted. pic.twitter.com/1gHVoRnmEi

Today I talked to @HoppyKercheval abt how I was encouraged by the President’s bipartisan tone during #SOTU. Now it’s time for @POTUS to take the lead & work with Democrats and Republicans to find the best pathway forward for securing our border, while keeping our government open. pic.twitter.com/7AjqJ1ScD5

Tonight the Senate voted to proceed to a S.47, a #publiclands package that will permanently reauthorize #LWCF & keep #WV wild & wonderful for years to come. Conservation is commonsense & helps support our state outdoor economy.

Tonight at #SOTU, I hope to hear the President chart a different path for our country – one of unity, compromise & commonsense. As always, I stand ready & willing to work with @POTUS, his admin. & my Dem, GOP colleagues to help WVians & Americans. MORE: https://www.manchin.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/manchin-on-state-of-the-union-time-to-work-together …

Senators have an obligation to advise & consent on the President’s nominees. Just as I do with all nominees I will examine David Bernhardt’s record & qualifications to be Secretary of Interior. I look forward to meeting w/him & to having him appear before @EnergyDems committee
I am proud to introduce the GEAR UP for Success Act and am excited to see how these West Virginians and Americans will shape our world into an even better one than we already have.

During the 2017-18 academic year, WV GEAR UP students spent more than 39,000 hours engaged in activities that promote academic achievement, career exploration, college awareness and ultimately increased participation in postsecondary education.

I'm proud to introduce the GEAR UP for Success Act, which would improve the GEAR UP federal grant program by giving grant recipients more flexibility to cater to local students’ needs. MORE: https://www.manchin.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/manchin-cornyn-introduce-gear-up- …

The @ARCgov is now accepting POWER Grant proposals until April 10 at 5PM. The POWER initiative has awarded $120 million to improve the economic outlook of coal-impacted communities. Organizations can learn more and apply for funding at  http://arc.gov/power .

Gayle and I are thankful that coaches and players on the Martinsburg girls basketball team are safe and recovering following a bus accident last night in Beckley. We ask all West Virginians to pray for their safe return to Martinsburg and for speedy recoveries.
